plugins.name: CSV to Table in Figma
plugins.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.


Key Features:


• Easy Import: Upload CSV files to automatically generate tables.

• Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

• Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

• Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

• Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: Transform Data Files into Editable Tables in Figma

plugins.name: Memoji Avatar Pack
plugins.description:
Add vibrant personality and diversity to your designs with the Memoji Avatars Library — a massive collection of over 1500 high-quality memoji and avatar illustrations. This plugin lets designers easily find, filter, and insert expressive characters by gender, skin tone, expression, and name — all without leaving your design workspace.


Whether you're creating user profiles, marketing materials, or social media graphics, these versatile memoji avatars help you craft inclusive and engaging visuals faster than ever. Designed for UI/UX designers, illustrators, and creatives seeking an efficient and rich asset library, this plugin is your go-to tool for diverse avatar illustration needs.
plugins.tagline: 1500+ customizable memoji and avatar illustrations at your fingertips.

137268.name: Memoji Avatar Pack
137268.description:

Whether you're creating user profiles, marketing materials, or social media graphics, these versatile memoji avatars help you craft inclusive and engaging visuals faster than ever. Designed for UI/UX designers, illustrators, and creatives seeking an efficient and rich asset library, this plugin is your go-to tool for diverse avatar illustration needs.
137268.tagline: 1500+ customizable memoji and avatar illustrations at your fingertips.

plugins.name: Gulugulu Effect - create Glass Effects in one click
plugins.description: Inspired by iOS 26 and modern glassmorphism trends, Gulugulu Effect lets you instantly apply a frosted glass look to any layer in Figma. It uses background blur, semi-transparent fills, and soft gradient strokes to recreate that polished, liquid-glass UI feel. No need to tweak settings manually. Just select, click, and vibe. Perfect for designers who want sleek, minimal, futuristic interfaces — fast.
plugins.tagline: Turn any shape into pure iOS-style liquid glass — in one click.

137206.name: Gulugulu Effect - create Glass Effects in one click
137206.description: Inspired by iOS 26 and modern glassmorphism trends, Gulugulu Effect lets you instantly apply a frosted glass look to any layer in Figma. It uses background blur, semi-transparent fills, and soft gradient strokes to recreate that polished, liquid-glass UI feel. No need to tweak settings manually. Just select, click, and vibe. Perfect for designers who want sleek, minimal, futuristic interfaces — fast.
137206.tagline: Turn any shape into pure iOS-style liquid glass — in one click.

plugins.name: Real Data Filler
plugins.description:
Real Data Filler is a quick and smart plugin that populates your Figma text layers with realistic placeholder data — perfect for mockups, UI design, and prototypes.


Choose from a clean, tabbed interface with options like:


Names (full names, first/last)


Emails (realistic domains)


Cities (worldwide)


Phone Numbers


Custom Lists (coming soon)


Each selected text node gets a random data value of the type you select.


Use this to:


Populate wireframes with real-seeming names and emails


Fill mobile/table UI designs with user data


Quickly visualize form states and list views
plugins.tagline: Fill selected text layers with real-looking names, emails, cities, and more

plugins.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
plugins.description:
VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflows


Variable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.


Features :


- Swap variables between local and published libraries

- Switch collections between local variables

- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily

- Work with current selection, page, or entire file

- See what will change before you apply it

- Handle thousands of variables at once

- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variables


How to use :


1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.

2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.

3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.


Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.


RoadMap :


- Find all variables used in your designs

- Export and import variable collections

- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​


This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.
plugins.tagline: Master all your variable workflows

plugins.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
plugins.description:
CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.


✨ Easily write new content from scratch.

🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.

⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.


Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!


How to Use

  1. Choose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.
  2. Enter your API key for the selected model.
  3. Select a text layer in your Figma file.
  4. Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.
  5. Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.


Get Gemini API Key

Get ChatGPT API Key
plugins.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

plugins.name: GIF Boss
plugins.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions
plugins.tagline: Simultaneous multi GIF generation.

136516.name: GIF Boss
136516.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions

plugins.name: ProtoFlow – Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
💡 Cos'è ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow è un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non è accessibile


🚀 Come funziona


Seleziona uno o più frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca “Scarica prototipo”.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all’utilizzo


🧠 Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un’intera schermata può essere interattiva.


📦 Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

plugins.name: Awesome Bulk Metadata Importer
plugins.description:
Have you ever tried to add extra documentation to your Figma components, looking or better parity with your code or docs site? With this plugin, you can better utilize the Assets menu by searching components or icons by description or keywords.


This plugin checks a JSON file, and updates the alt text/description, synonym keywords, and link for all components and variants. Run this 1x for your entire library and stop wasting time manually updating metadata!


Sample CSV and JSON template
plugins.tagline: Bulk update your component descriptions, keywords, and docs link

137250.description:

plugins.name: Logo Master
plugins.description: Logo Master lets you quickly browse, search, and insert a vast library of SVG logos directly into your designs. Filter by category or letter, choose color, white, or black variants, and select multiple logos for a fast bulk import onto your canvas.
plugins.tagline: Instantly add, search, and import SVG logos.

136677.name: Logo Master
136677.description: Logo Master lets you quickly browse, search, and insert a vast library of SVG logos directly into your designs. Filter by category or letter, choose color, white, or black variants, and select multiple logos for a fast bulk import onto your canvas.
136677.tagline: Instantly add, search, and import SVG logos.

plugins.name: DeepL Translator
plugins.description:
DeepL Translator


A Figma plugin that quickly translates text within frames using the DeepL API.

The acceleration feature enables faster translations and cost savings.


Features


  1. 🚀 Fast Translation: Re-use past translation history for fast fast translation
  2. 💰️ Cost Saving: Save API Usage by Re-use past translation history
  3. 🌐 Multi-language Support: Supports 29 languages
  4. 📚 Glossary Support: Use DeepL glossaries for consistent translations
  5. 🌍 Auto Detection: Automatic source language detection
  6. 📝 Non-destructive: Creates new frames for translations while preserving originals
  7. 🎯 Simple Operation: Just select languages and click translate


How to Use


  1. Get a DeepL API key (see below)
  2. Select a frame containing text to translate
  3. Choose source and target languages
  4. (Optional) Select a glossary
  5. Click "Translate"
  6. Translation results appear in a new frame


Getting a DeepL API Key


1. Sign up for a DeepL account at DeepL Pro

  1. Free plan available (500,000 characters/month)
  2. Pro plan available for more usage

2. Get your API key:

  1. Log in to your DeepL account
  2. Go to "Account" → "API keys"
  3. Copy your API key

3. Enter your API key in the plugin settings


Supported Languages


See the complete list of supported languages for details.


Major languages include:


  1. English (EN)
  2. Chinese (ZH)
  3. Korean (KO)
  4. German (DE)
  5. French (FR)
  6. Spanish (ES)
  7. Italian (IT)
  8. Dutch (NL)
  9. Japanese (JA)
  10. Portuguese (PT)
  11. Russian (RU)


And 18 more languages


Notes


  1. DeepL API key required (available with free plan)
  2. Free plan includes 500,000 characters per month
  3. Source language must be specified when using glossaries
  4. API keys are securely encrypted and stored


Support & Feedback


We welcome your feedback! Please contact to developer through:


- Contact Form for:

  1. Questions & Inquiries
  2. Feature Requests
  3. Bug Reports
  4. General Feedback


Privacy

  1. DeepL API keys are securely encrypted
  2. Translation data is processed on DeepL servers and not stored
plugins.tagline: Translate texts in Figma by DeepL

plugins.name: Scout : Your Design System Auditor
plugins.description:
Scout: Your Design System Auditor

Ever felt like your design tokens are playing hide-and-seek? 🕵️‍♀️ Meet Scout, your trusty design detective—ready to sniff out sneaky inconsistencies and bring harmony back to your Figma universe!


Scout swiftly audits your Figma files, uncovering rogue color hexes and typography rebels that forgot their tokens at home. No more developer handoff blues or "Oops, missed that!" moments. 🎯


Superpowers:

Color Detective: Catches color chaos quicker than you can shout “Hex!”


Typography Sleuth: Spots font fugitives and sizes that went astray, keeping your design tight.


Smart Suggestions: Suggests spot-on tokens and handy fallbacks instantly—because who doesn't love instant magic? ✨


Theme-Agnostic: Works seamlessly with both light and dark themes, maintaining style consistency across all modes.


Local Variable & Style Support: Perfectly compatible with local variables and styles, ensuring complete design system integration.


Pinpoint Precision: Clearly tells you exactly where the issue is—no guessing games, just solutions!


How to Use Scout:


1. Feed Your Tokens: Connect Scout to your design system first—it'll securely save all your tokens locally.

2. Scan: Open Scout in any Figma file, select the frame you want to check, and hit "Scan."

3. Instant Results: Scout immediately highlights issues, suggests precise fixes, and ensures your designs stay token-perfect.


Scout is fun, quirky, and deadly accurate; a designer's best friend and a developer's dream come true. Let Scout do the heavy lifting and keep your designs perfectly polished. 


Get Scout today and give your design system the auditor it deserves.


Scout is currently in beta. Found bugs? Have questions, suggestions, or feature requests? 💌 DM me on Twitter

accepted.name: Satyam
accepted.description: Product and UI/UX Designer | Email me at sat02yam@gmail.com

plugins.tagline: Keep Scouting

plugins.name: Content Magic Filler with OpenAI
plugins.description:
1. Select one or more layers in your Figma file (the plugin will find all text layers within your selection).
  2. Open the plugin and enter your OpenAI API key. If you don't have one: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key
  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).
  4. Click "Generate Text". Each selected text layer will be filled with a unique, AI-generated response matching your instruction.
plugins.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma text layers with smart, unique AI-generated content.

135957.name: Content Magic Filler with OpenAI
135957.description:
1. Select one or more layers in your Figma file (the plugin will find all text layers within your selection).
  2. Open the plugin and enter your OpenAI API key. If you don't have one: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key
  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).
  4. Click "Generate Text". Each selected text layer will be filled with a unique, AI-generated response matching your instruction.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs to communicate with OpenAI's API to generate AI-powered text content for selected layers in Figma.

135957.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma text layers with smart, unique AI-generated content.

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of services and  offer a series of products for businesses you can access from our website.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way

plugins.name: Timestamp
plugins.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
plugins.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

135132.name: Timestamp
135132.description:

Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.

Transform your design into clean, usable code in minutes — no manual handoff, no guesswork.

plugins.name: Section Distributor
plugins.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
plugins.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

134431.name: Section Distributor
134431.description:
Section Distributor is a Figma plugin that instantly organizes your Section elements into a clean, vertical stack. Simply select your sections, enter a custom spacing value, and click “Distribute” to move the first section to 0×0 and cascade all others below it at precisely that interval.


Eliminate manual nudging and pixel-perfect alignment headaches—keep your wireframes, design systems, documentation pages, and style guides consistently laid out in seconds.
134431.tagline: Auto-stack your sections starting at 0,0 with perfect, customizable spacing—one click and done.

plugins.name: Padding Scaler
plugins.description:
Padding Scaler helps designers rapidly create compact, default, and spacious layout variants by scaling the vertical paddings of auto-layout frames.


Instead of editing each value manually, simply select your frames, choose a scale (0.5× to 4×), and instantly apply consistent spacing changes.


Ideal for testing different density modes or aligning with design system spacing tokens.


✨ Features:


Works with one or many auto-layout frames


Choose vertical, horizontal, or both directions


Fast, intuitive UI with live scaling preview


Save time, stay consistent, and iterate layout decisions faster.
plugins.tagline: Instantly scale vertical and/or horizontal paddings in auto-layout frames to test density modes.

134488.name: Padding Scaler
134488.description:
Padding Scaler helps designers rapidly create compact, default, and spacious layout variants by scaling the vertical paddings of auto-layout frames.


Instead of editing each value manually, simply select your frames, choose a scale (0.5× to 4×), and instantly apply consistent spacing changes.


Ideal for testing different density modes or aligning with design system spacing tokens.


✨ Features:


Works with one or many auto-layout frames


Choose vertical, horizontal, or both directions


Fast, intuitive UI with live scaling preview


Save time, stay consistent, and iterate layout decisions faster.
134488.tagline: Instantly scale vertical and/or horizontal paddings in auto-layout frames to test density modes.

plugins.name: Figma Link Exporter
plugins.description:
igmaファイル内のセクション（Section）、コンポーネント（Component）、コンポーネントセット（ComponentSet）、バリアント（Variant）を自動検出し、それぞれの直接リンクを生成するプラグインです。デザインシステムの管理や共有に最適です。

主な機能

  1. 自動検出: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、コンポーネントセット、バリアントを自動で検出
  2. 詳細情報表示: 各要素の番号、種類、名前、直接リンクを一覧表示
  3. 複数形式でエクスポート: 検出した情報をTXT、CSV、JSON形式でダウンロード可能

使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムのドキュメント作成
  2. チーム内でのコンポーネント共有
  3. 開発者へのデザイン仕様の引き渡し
  4. プロジェクト管理のための要素整理

使い方

  1. プラグインを起動
  2. 「情報を取得」ボタンをクリック
  3. 検出された要素の一覧を確認
  4. 希望の形式（TXT/CSV/JSON）を選択してダウンロード
  5. シンプルな操作で、デザインファイル内の重要な要素へのリンクを素早くエクスポートできます。
plugins.tagline: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、バリアントを自動検出し、それらの直接リンクをTXT/CSV/JSON形式でエクスポートできるプラグインです。

plugins.name: Nexus
plugins.description:
Nexus is a Figma plugin designed to seamlessly sync content from Google Sheets while automatically updating text layers and their names.


Built for designers and product teams, Nexus eliminates manual copy-pasting by connecting your Figma files to a centralized content source. Select a language, pick the texts you need, and apply them in one click — layer names and content are updated instantly.


✅ Real-time sync with Google Sheets

✅ Automatic update of text layer content

✅ Structured layer renaming (#BODY.x, #CTA.x)

✅ Clean, intuitive interface for efficient workflows


Save time. Stay consistent. Focus on design.

Nexus handles the repetitive work — you focus on creating.
plugins.tagline: Power Your Workflow

Built for designers and product teams, Nexus eliminates manual copy-pasting by connecting your Figma files to a centralized content source. Select a language, pick the texts you need, and apply them in one click — layer names and content are updated instantly.

Save time. Stay consistent. Focus on design.

plugins.name: Tokenize Your Design
plugins.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

133450.name: Tokenize Your Design
133450.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.

plugins.name: Hotkey
plugins.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
plugins.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

135952.name: Hotkey
135952.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
135952.release_notes:
Commands:
1. New Increase/Decrease Width & Height Commands: Use +h, -h, +w, and -w to dynamically adjust height and width values relative to current dimensions.

Other Changes:
1. Added support for + and - prefixes in command parsing (e.g., +h12, -w8) and updated internal regex handling accordingly.
135952.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

plugins.name: Find Elements
plugins.description:
Using this tool, we can find any Text Nodes having phrase 'Lorem' i.e. dummy text across the entire page. Then we can find any Text Nodes which do not match the font parameters i.e. Font Family, Style and Size. Finally, we can also find all nodes not matching the color given in hex values.

This is tool is helpful to find mis-matched items based on the given parameters.
plugins.tagline: Find text having 'Lorem', find text with non-matching font and find items with non-matching colors

This plugin lets you extract CSS styles from a selected text layer in Figma.

Get accurate font-weight, font-size, color, line-height, and letter-spacing instantly, formatted in pure CSS.


Perfect for developers and designers who want a fast way to turn styled text into usable web code.

plugins.name: Replacer
plugins.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
plugins.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

127834.name: Replacer
127834.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
127834.release_notes: Added a "Delete" button to remove selected styles
127834.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

plugins.name: PSD Importer for Figma
plugins.description:
Import your PSD files directly into Figma. It preserves the design elements such as layer structure, text properties, and complex styles, offering a smooth transition from Photoshop to Figma.


There are 2 import methods.

  1. Import all layers with maximum compatibility.
  2. Import each layer is bitmap image.


While the plugin strives for high accuracy, some discrepancies may occur due to differences between Photoshop and Figma’s rendering engines - particularly with complex effects, blending modes, and certain layer styles. In cases where features can’t be translated, some layers may be imported as images.


Users can try the plugin with three free PSD imports, after which unlimited access is available through an $8/month subscription.
plugins.tagline: Easily import your PSD files in just a few clicks.

133175.name: PSD Importer for Figma
133175.description:
Import your PSD files directly into Figma. It preserves the design elements such as layer structure, text properties, and complex styles, offering a smooth transition from Photoshop to Figma.


There are 2 import methods.

  1. Import all layers with maximum compatibility.
  2. Import each layer is bitmap image.


While the plugin strives for high accuracy, some discrepancies may occur due to differences between Photoshop and Figma’s rendering engines - particularly with complex effects, blending modes, and certain layer styles. In cases where features can’t be translated, some layers may be imported as images.


Users can try the plugin with three free PSD imports, after which unlimited access is available through an $8/month subscription.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to the internet to process PSD files.

133175.tagline: Easily import your PSD files in just a few clicks.

plugins.name: Round Width to 8
plugins.description:
Make your designs cleaner and more consistent with this simple plugin that rounds the width of selected elements up to the next multiple of 8. Great for enforcing 8px spacing systems, aligning to design tokens, or preparing components for dev handoff.


Just select one or more resizable elements and run the plugin — no UI, no fuss.
plugins.tagline: Rounds element widths up to the next multiple of 8 — clean, consistent, and dev-ready.

127315.name: Round Width to 8
127315.description:
Make your designs cleaner and more consistent with this simple plugin that rounds the width of selected elements up to the next multiple of 8. Great for enforcing 8px spacing systems, aligning to design tokens, or preparing components for dev handoff.


Just select one or more resizable elements and run the plugin — no UI, no fuss.
127315.tagline: Rounds element widths up to the next multiple of 8 — clean, consistent, and dev-ready.

plugins.name: AUTA - Figma Frame Exporter
plugins.description:
AUTA - Figma Frame Exporter

이 플러그인은 Figma의 현재 페이지에 있는 모든 프레임을 JSON 파일로 내보내줍니다.

프레임의 이름, 위치, 크기, 이미지(베이스64 인코딩), 인터랙션 등 다양한 메타데이터가 포함되어 있습니다.
plugins.tagline: extractor, ui, json

plugins.name: frameToGroup
plugins.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
plugins.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

plugins.name: Canonical pet name generator
plugins.description: Jammy Jellyfish, Bionic Beaver or Noble Numbat. The code names of the Ubuntu releases are iconic. You can use this plugin to create random pet names in your text layers in the style of the Ubuntu code names. The plugin is perfect if, for example, you need to design an overview of machines and you want these machines to have random but funny (pet) names.

accepted.name: Canonical
accepted.description: Canonical makes open source secure, reliable and easy to use, providing support for Ubuntu and a portfolio of enterprise-grade technologies.

plugins.tagline: Generate Ubuntu style pet names for your text layers.

plugins.name: ezpzstatus
plugins.description: EZPZStatus is your go-to Figma plugin for effortless frame and section tracking. With a simple click, outline your work based on its status—whether it's in progress, ready for review, or handed off. Stay organized and keep your team in the loop with clear, color-coded visual cues that make project management a breeze.
plugins.tagline: track and collaborate, ezpz-ily.

Stay organized and keep your team in the loop with clear, color-coded visual cues that make project management a breeze.
105926.release_notes: now works on frames with clip content switched on

plugins.name: Basic
plugins.description: Analyze the layers
plugins.tagline: tool

plugins.name: 打印工具 Figma Print Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

Figma Print Pro is a specialized plugin that helps you create print-ready documents directly in Figma. Easily set up standard or custom page sizes, add bleed areas and crop marks, export high-quality PDFs in multiple color formats, and ensure professional results with built-in DPI checks.


Function Description

  1. Custom & Preset Dimensions: Choose from popular print sizes (A4, A3, B5) or enter exact dimensions.
  2. Bleed & Crop Marks: Add bleed lines and crop marks to prepare for professional trimming.
  3. Multi-page Documents: Generate multi-page print layouts all within a single Figma file.
  4. Color Management: Export PDFs in RGB, CMYK, or grayscale for precise color control.
  5. Adjustable Image Quality: Downsample images and set compression levels to optimize file size.
  6. DPI Checks: Analyze frames to confirm whether resolution meets professional print standards.


Usage

  1. Set Up a Document: In the plugin panel, pick a preset size (A4, A3, B5) or enter your custom width and height.
  2. Adjust Settings: Define bleed margins, enable crop marks, and specify the page count.
  3. Preview: The plugin generates a quick visual preview of each page.
  4. Export to PDF: Choose a color format (RGB, CMYK, or grayscale), select image quality settings, then export.
  5. Check DPI: Run the DPI check tool to ensure images and frames meet print-quality standards.


Tips

  1. Recommended DPI: For most print jobs, 300 DPI is standard. Ensure your images and frames meet or exceed this resolution.
  2. Color Consistency: When using CMYK, note that colors may differ slightly from on-screen previews.
  3. Bleed Setup: If your printer requires a bleed, confirm the exact measurement specifications with your print provider.
  4. Downsampling: Keep an eye on image clarity if you significantly reduce the DPI to minimize file size.


介绍

Figma Print Pro 是一款专为在 Figma 中直接创建印刷文档的插件。它支持自定义或常见的标准纸张尺寸，允许添加出血线和裁切线，支持导出多种颜色格式的高质量 PDF，并可进行 DPI 检查，帮助您轻松获得专业的印刷效果。


功能说明

  1. 自定义与预设尺寸：可使用常见的印刷尺寸（A4、A3、B5）或自行输入宽高。
  2. 出血线与裁切线：可配置出血线并添加裁切线，满足专业印刷需求。
  3. 多页文档：在单个 Figma 文件中快速生成多页的打印版面。
  4. 颜色管理：支持 RGB、CMYK 以及灰度输出，便于精确控制印刷颜色。
  5. 可调节图像质量：支持图像降采样并可设置压缩比，实现更小文件体积。
  6. DPI 检查：可检查 Frame 分辨率，判断是否符合专业印刷要求。


使用方法

  1. 文档设置：在插件面板中，选择 A4、A3、B5 等预设尺寸，或手动输入自定义宽高。
  2. 参数调整：设定出血值、是否添加裁切线，以及需要的页面数量。
  3. 预览页面：插件会生成每页的预览，方便快速查看效果。
  4. 导出 PDF：选择颜色模式（RGB、CMYK 或灰度），根据需求调整图像质量后即可导出。
  5. 检查 DPI：使用 DPI 检查功能，确保图像或 Frame 的分辨率达到了可印刷的标准。


注意事项

  1. 建议 DPI：一般印刷要求 300 DPI，确保图像及画框分辨率符合或高于该标准。
  2. 颜色差异：使用 CMYK 模式时，实际印刷颜色可能与屏幕上显示的略有偏差。
  3. 出血线设置：如印刷厂有特殊要求，请提前确认所需的出血值。
  4. 图像降采样：若大幅降低分辨率以减小文件体积，需注意图像清晰度的影响。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Streamline print creation & DPI checks in Figma
